name: Cocktail Meatballs 4 Ways
author: Susan Quinn
summary: Cocktail meatballs are a party favorite, but the calories add up fast. Cut fat and calories (and add filling fiber) with a can of beans. Follow this formula to enjoy 6 meatballs with around 200 calories and 7 grams of fat. Serve with desired sauce and garnish.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can no-salt-added cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
½ cup fine dry bread crumbs
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Pulse beans, garlic, egg white, water, salt-free seasoning, salt, and pepper in a food processor until smooth
Mix together bean mixture, ground beef, and bread crumbs in a large bowl
Shape into 1-inch balls and put on a lightly greased rimmed baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until a thermometer inserted in centers registers 165 degrees F (74 degrees C), 12 to 14 minutes
